other_tests.findings: Isolated T-wave inversion in lead III.

5.1 x 4.4 x 3.7 cm heterogeneous mass centered over the second portion of the duodenum, displacing the pancreatic head and duodenal lumen. A 6 mm T2 hyperintense cystic structure in the tail of the pancreas, likely representing a side branch IPMN. No significant adjacent lymphadenopathy identified.
